constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 50 (Wednesday, March 17, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H1500-H1501]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KUSTER:
H.R. 1978.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H1501]]
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution, the Taxing and Spending Clause: ``The Congress
shall have Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts
and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide for the common
Defense and general Welfare of the United States . . . ''

latestAction.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote .

title: Protecting Seniors Through Immunization Act of 2021
